title: The PC of the GODS! - Ironside Computers Yggdrasil PC
description: Check out the Viewsonic X2000B-4K at:   This PC from Ironside Computers has a unique selling point... a stained glass side panel! Plouffe is here to take a look to find out if this Norse God PC really has stained glass or if the mosaic PC is just a dream.  Check out the Ironside Yggdrasil PC at:   Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 This PC has a unique feature 0:23 Forbidden Cheetos 1:53 Is it real stained glass? 2:23 Cable management and SI Test checklist 3:16 Included accessories 4:11 Opening it up and specs list 8:35 Sponsor - Viewsonic 9:04 Powering it up 10:20 How does the stained glass look? 11:02 Staff reactions - David and Adam 13:00 Gaming - Dying Light 2 14:05 Pricing overall thoughts 15:12 Outro
